item.description:
Hurray for Hollywood! No matter who wins Best Actor, Best Actress, or Best Picture, Oscar is the real star of the show. Bring your tally sheets, & your Hollywood insider’s gossip (or just the latest issues of People & Us magazines). Check out the fab gowns on the red carpet, & figure out whose marriage will break up right after winning the statuette.

 

BYOB and a dish to share.  Include what you're bringing in your RSVP so our hosts can coordinate the food.

 

Address and/or directions supplied when you RSVP.
item.why: if you've attended any of our Dinner & a Movie nights, this is your event!
item.name: Oscar Party
